title: New: Becoming Sun – Out Of Breath
content:
Snow is such a beautiful and wondrous occurrence, mainly for the way in which it appears to alter landscape formations, yet when it melts and subsides, everything is exactly how it was before.

Becoming Sun’s latest track, the at times barely there Out Of Breath, appears to document this moment of melting, the revealing of what already existed, exposing it as somehow new and unique. A revival.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
